ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Make way for the newbie!
ygData.msgSnippet: I stand corrected, I never used bellow except to pull with.  Guess I shoudl have...  Though if I had been able to solo at 14, I wouldn t have met my guild in
ygData.messageBody:
I stand corrected, I never used bellow except to pull with. Guess I shoudl
have... Though if I had been able to solo at 14, I wouldn't have met my
guild in oasis that fateful day... "Hey we're a pretty good group, we
should find a few more players we like to play with and form a guild" I'm
still with them, about to ding 51 (I think lvl 50 will be my shortest level
since 25, got 4 bubs of it at Death Beetle camp in SolB last night). Though
sadly we are pretty much out of commision, lost 75% of our core players to
another guild and everyone but me that remains is going to join some huge
guild (where we have a lot of friends). Which means I will be lvl 51 and
guildless most likely :(
